Indian Economy.title: Money saved with banks serve worthy purposes: Why deposits need a tax break
Indian Economy.summary: Bank deposits underpin much of India’s economic architecture—from part financing government budgets to priority-sector lending. Yet, interest income faces punitive taxation, pushing savers into riskier avenues of investment. It calls for a tax rethink.
